channel.title: How can i stop the lag when i log into a server?
channel.description:
ok every server i log into has a horrible lag when i log in...you know say u log into a pk server an ur at the bank? takes me bout 45 mins just to get out of lag...an then on some servers ive waited over 2 hours from a lag! this is getting rediculous..! please anyone help me...
an i also need help with hamachi when i start it up i go through tutorial thing....when it comes to the part "click power to continue" so i do...but then when hamachi gets to the "setting up" part a window pops up an says this..
configuration problem is most likely cause by your firewalling software blocking DHCP traffic on hamachi adapter. please make sure UDP traffic from local port 68 to port 67 at 5.0.0.1 is allowed. alternatively you can try completely disabling firewall on hamachi adapter. [br][size=1]Posted on: January 14, 2007, 02:25:57 AM[/size][hr]please?

item.title: How can i stop the lag when i log into a server?
item.dc:creator: @spit_me_out spit_me_out
item.description:
@spit_me_out wrote:

ok every server i log into has a horrible lag when i log in…you know say u log into a pk server an ur at the bank? takes me bout 45 mins just to get out of lag…an then on some servers ive waited over 2 hours from a lag! this is getting rediculous…! please anyone help me…

an i also need help with hamachi when i start it up i go through tutorial thing…when it comes to the part “click power to continue” so i do…but then when hamachi gets to the “setting up” part a window pops up an says this…

configuration problem is most likely cause by your firewalling software blocking DHCP traffic on hamachi adapter. please make sure UDP traffic from local port 68 to port 67 at 5.0.0.1 is allowed. alternatively you can try completely disabling firewall on hamachi adapter.
[br][size=1]Posted on: January 14, 2007, 02:25:57 AM[/size][hr]please?

Read full topic
